remarks: The product of two non-trivially converging products converges non-trivially.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)
statement:
ntrivcvgmul.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
ntrivcvgmul.3 $e |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , F ) ~~> y ) ) $.
ntrivcvgmul.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
ntrivcvgmul.5 $e |- ( ph -> E. m e. Z E. z ( z =/= 0 /\ seq m ( x. , G ) ~~> z ) ) $.
ntrivcvgmul.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
ntrivcvgmul.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) x. ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
ntrivcvgmul $p |- ( ph -> E. p e. Z E. w ( w =/= 0 /\ seq p ( x. , H ) ~~> w ) ) $.
$d F k m z $.
$d F m w z $.
$d G k n y $.
$d G n w y $.
$d H k m n y z $.
$d H m n p w y z $.
$d Z k m n y z $.
$d Z m n p y z $.
$d k m n ph y z $.
